text:
Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel follows Danvers, an Air Force officer, as she becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes after earth gets involved in a galactic war between alien. The film also stars Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn, Brie Larson, and Annette Bening.
"Particularly with this film, I wanted to do more character-driven stuff," Reed told Comic-Con attendees last year. "I think what we found was something that's really important about Carol's origin story is it's not just about how she got her powers and became a superhero, but it's really about who she is, what motivates her, what drives her."
Captain Marvel hits theaters on March 8th. You can also catch up on some Avengers: Endgame news too while you're here! Let us know your thoughts on this one in the comments!
